title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid username and password and are redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password for a standard user
Click the login button
User is logged in successfully and redirected to the user dashboard
Log out
Repeat login for an admin user with valid credentials
Admin user is logged in successfully and redirected to the admin panel

title: Failed login attempt with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and displays an appropriate error message when invalid username or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Login fails and error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access pages or perform actions outside their assigned role permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a cashier user
Attempt to navigate to the Admin Panel URL directly
Access is denied and unauthorized or forbidden error page is displayed
Log in as an employee without admin rights
Try to perform admin-only actions like user management
Action is blocked and an error or permission denied message is shown

title: Dashboard statistics display accurate real-time data
description: Verify that dashboard widgets and charts display correct statistics reflecting recent orders, revenue, attendance, and other operational metrics.

steps.description: Log in as a manager or admin user
Dashboard widgets display accurate counts for new orders, revenue, employee attendance
Create a new order through the cashier interface
Dashboard statistics update to reflect the new order in real-time or upon refresh
Log employee attendance for the day
Attendance stats on the dashboard reflect the logged attendance correctly

title: Customer Management CRUD operations
description: Verify creation, reading, update, and deletion of customer records including viewing order history.

steps.description: Navigate to Customer Management page
Create a new customer with valid details
Customer is created and appears in the customer list
Select the created customer and update their details
Customer details are updated correctly and persisted
View the customer's order history
Order history displays correctly with accurate data
Delete the customer record
Customer is removed from the list and cannot be accessed

title: Invoice and Order Management workflow
description: Verify that cashier can create invoices with selected customers and items, track order status, and preview/print invoices.

steps.description: Log in as cashier and navigate to cashier interface
Select an existing customer or add a new customer
Add services and products to the cart with quantities and prices
Submit the order and create an invoice
Invoice is created with correct details and status set as pending
Preview the created invoice
Invoice preview displays all order details formatted properly
Print the invoice
Printable invoice is generated without errors
Update order status to completed or processing
Order status updates correctly and reflects on the invoice list

title: Department and Sub-item Management CRUD operations
description: Verify creating, editing, and deleting departments and their corresponding sub-items are functioning correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Department Management page
Create a new department with valid fields
Department is added to the list successfully
Edit department details
Changes are saved and reflected in the department list
Delete a department and confirm deletion
Department is removed and no longer accessible
Navigate to Sub-item Management under a department
Add new sub-items and edit/delete existing ones
Sub-items CRUD operations function properly with correct data binding

title: Employee Management and Attendance tracking
description: Verify adding employees, assigning roles, tracking attendance, and viewing attendance reports.

steps.description: Navigate to Employee Management page
Create a new employee record with role assignment
Employee appears in the list with correct role
Navigate to Attendance Tracking page
Log attendance for the employee including clock-in and clock-out times
Attendance records are saved and listed correctly
Generate attendance report for a selected period
Report contains accurate attendance data for employees

title: Salary Management CRUD and calculation validation
description: Verify correct CRUD operations on salary records and that salary calculations reflect attendance and role info.

steps.description: Navigate to Salary Management page
Create a salary record for an employee with base salary and bonuses
Salary record is saved and correctly associated with the employee
Edit the salary details and update bonuses or deductions
Updates are saved and shown correctly
Validate that salary amounts correspond to attendance records and role-based pay rates
Salary values reflect calculations as per business logic

title: Product and Supplier Management CRUD operations
description: Verify that products and suppliers can be added, edited, and deleted with correct data integrity.

steps.description: Navigate to Product Management page
Add new product with name, category, price, and stock quantity
Product appears in the list and details are accurate
Edit product details including price and stock
Changes are saved and reflected
Delete a product and confirm removal
Product is removed from the inventory
Navigate to Supplier Management page
Add a new supplier with contact details
Supplier is listed with correct information
Edit and delete supplier entries
Supplier data updates and removal works correctly

title: Financial Management operations and error handling
description: Verify management and viewing of financial transactions including revenues, expenses, and payments. Verify error messages on invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to Financial Management page
Add a new revenue entry with valid amount, date, and description
Revenue is listed and totals are updated
Add an expense entry with missing mandatory fields
Form validation prevents submission and error messages are shown
Add a valid expense entry
Expense is recorded and financial summary reflects it correctly
Navigate to Payments page
Record a payment against a customer invoice
Payment is saved and invoice payment status updates correctly

title: Coupon Management lifecycle
description: Verify creation, editing, activation/deactivation, and deletion of discount coupons with validation.

steps.description: Navigate to Coupon Management page
Create a new coupon with code, discount value, expiry date and usage limits
Coupon is listed and details are correct
Edit coupon properties such as discount amount and expiry
Changes save correctly and reflect in the list
Deactivate and then reactivate the coupon
Coupon status updates properly
Delete the coupon
Coupon is removed from the system

title: Reports generation and data accuracy
description: Verify that various reports including customer reports, financial reports, and operational reports generate correctly with accurate data and support filtering and exporting.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports page
Generate a customer report for a specified time range
Report displays accurate customer activity data matching the database
Generate financial report with filters for revenues and expenses
Report data sums and details are correct
Generate operational report showing order status and employee participation
Operational data matches expected workload and order counts
Export each report to CSV or Excel
Exported files contain complete and formatted data corresponding to the displayed reports

title: Work Sections attendance and tracking
description: Verify employees can log work times under different laundry sections (e.g., receiving, sorting, washing, ironing) and status updates are tracked.

steps.description: Navigate to Work Sections page
Select a work section and log-in an employee's attendance with start time
Attendance for that work section is recorded and displayed
Log the employee's end time or status update
Attendance time and work session status updates are saved correctly

title: System and Profile Settings update and persistence
description: Verify that users can update system-wide and personal profile settings, and changes are persisted across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to System Settings page as admin
Modify settings such as laundry details or notification preferences
Save changes
Changes persist and are accurately reflected when revisiting settings
Navigate to Profile Settings for a user
Update profile info such as email, phone number, or password
Profile changes are saved, and user can log in with updated information

title: Admin Panel functionality and user management
description: Verify that admins can manage users, laundries, registrations, and system settings and view analytics without permission leaks.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to the Admin Panel
Access user management and view user list
Create a new user with admin or staff roles
User is created with the assigned role and appears in list
Edit user roles and permissions
Permissions update properly and restrict/allow access accordingly
Access laundries and registration requests, approve or reject requests
Changes reflect correctly and notifications are sent to users
View analytics dashboard for platform-wide reports
Analytics charts and data load accurately without errors

title: Subscription and Package Management flows
description: Verify that subscription plans and packages can be created, selected, renewed, and canceled, with status updates reflected properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Subscription Management page
Create new subscription plans and packages with pricing and duration
New plans appear in the list correctly
Select a subscription plan for a customer and subscribe
Subscription status updates to active and billing info is correct
Renew an existing subscription before expiry
Subscription expiry date extends and renewal is recorded
Cancel a subscription and verify cancellation process
Subscription status updates to canceled and customer is restricted accordingly

title: Theme management and dark mode toggle
description: Verify the ability to toggle between light and dark themes, save the preference, and persist across sessions.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to any page with theme toggle
Toggle the theme from light to dark mode
UI changes to dark mode correctly with all components rendered properly
Reload the page or log out and log back in
Dark mode preference persists and UI remains in dark mode
Toggle back to light mode and verify changes and persistence again

title: Error handling for unauthorized and server error pages
description: Verify that error pages for unauthorized access (401, 403) and server errors (500) display appropriate messages and UI components.

steps.description: Attempt to access restricted pages without login
401 Unauthorized error page is displayed
Log in with insufficient privileges and try to access forbidden pages
403 Forbidden error page is shown
Simulate server errors by causing backend failure or API error
500 Internal Server Error page is shown with meaningful message

title: Data export functionality for reports and customers
description: Verify that users can export report and customer data correctly to supported formats (e.g., CSV) and that files contain complete and accurate data.

steps.description: Navigate to Customer Management or Reports page
Use export dialog to select data range and export options
Export data as CSV file
Exported file downloads successfully and data content matches displayed data including headers and field values
Repeat export with different filters and verify data correctness
